body: If you could have any #superpower, what would it be? I’d choose #teleportation—imagine never having to #commute again! #randomthoughts

comments.body: Teleportation is a good one, but I’d pick the ability to control time. You could pause, rewind, or fast forward through awkward situations.
@67676 Time control would be amazing! Imagine reliving the best moments of your life over and over again.
I’d go with invisibility. Sometimes it’d be nice to just disappear for a while and have some peace and quiet.
@78787 That sounds tempting, especially during stressful days. But I’d be worried about accidentally becoming invisible at the wrong time!
Flying, no question. Who wouldn’t want to soar through the skies? Plus, you could skip traffic completely.
@89898 Flying would be incredible! The views alone would be worth it. But would you fly low to the ground or way up in the clouds?
@56565 Definitely up in the clouds! Can you imagine the sunsets you’d see from that height?
I’d choose the ability to speak and understand any language instantly. You could travel anywhere and connect with anyone in their native language.
@90909 That’s such a practical superpower! You’d be the ultimate diplomat, not to mention how much you’d learn about different cultures.
